jump_scares.spoiler: Eric reaches out to open the door and a maid comes through the door from the other side startling him
Eric readjusts the mirror a third time and sees a ghostly boy appear behind it
Eric adjusts the mirror once more and in the reflection sees a ghostly boy holding a pitchfork
Eric has a vision of a spirit crawling up the stairs towards him
Henry looks under the bed and a toy train suddenly races past
A silhouette moves past the screen accompanied by a sound effect
Eric watches Sarah through the partially open door when he is startled by a spirit who suddenly appears at the opening
Henry shoots through a wall at Sarah
Sarah opens a door from the other side startling Eric
After hanging up the phone, Eric bumps into Ben
As Ben says “They will all die” he transforms into a spirit
Marion turns around and sees a hand sticking out of the rubble
Eric opens a door and sees a ghost in front of him
A bell rings during a tense scene
The wooden train races past Marion
Marion turns around and a spirit is beside her
